title: Automania 2000
creator_contributor_role: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Automobiles - Social aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Technology - Social aspects
description: An animated satire on problems of automotive design and lack of proper roads and parking facilities. Shows what could happen in the year 2000 when people are forced to live in their cars and the car finally becomes able to reproduce itself. Animator: Harold Whitaker; Writer: Joy Batchelor.
